content: Tell what fraction one third is equal to in a mixed number format and include the decimal equivalent rounded to the nearest hundredth.

One third as a fraction is \(\frac{1}{3}\). In mixed number format, it remains \(\frac{1}{3}\) because it is less than 1 and does not have a whole number component. The decimal equivalent of \(\frac{1}{3}\) is approximately 0.3333, which rounds to 0.33 when rounded to the nearest hundredth.
